articles.title: From Michael Irvin to Jason Witten, the all-time best and worst Cowboys WR/TE draft picks
articles.description: Editor's note: This story has been updated. SportsDay's Dallas Cowboys beat writers examined the best draft picks by the team at each position since 1967, the year the AFL and NFL stopped drafting the same players. Below are the top wide receiver and tight en…
